entry.title: Bitcoin Lost
entry.content:
An analysis [1] calculates that the fraction of bitcoin "permanently" lost (due to e.g. wallets without keys, etc.) is around 25% of current circulation.

[1]found via this article (and originally I believe in a podcast I was listening to... forget which)

entry.title: TIL

entry.content:
Small tidbits I've learned, with only a touch of order and cleanliness.

Inspired by https://github.com/jbranchaud/til and its post on Orange Site.

If you notice something I've learned that's still wrong, correcting me would be amazingly appreciated!

(And of course, a usual disclaimer -- I am not a doctor, a medical researcher or a lawyer, so despite anything that may seem relevant to those fields, do not take my advice on medicine or law!)

entry.title: Toy Story 2
entry.content: Toy Story 2 was nearly accidentally completely deleted due to an rm -rf /, except an employee was working from home and happened to have a backup of the film on their laptop.
